title: What Would Jesus Buy 2008 DVDSCR-VoMiT (Kingdom-KvCD by Pcconsul
description:
Release Title What Would Jesus Buy 2008 DVDSCR-VoMiT (Kingdom-KvCD by Pcconsultant2007)
Release Date November 16, 2007
Release Length 01:31:04
Storyline An examination of the commercialization of Christmas in America while following Reverend Billy and the Church of Stop Shopping Gospel Choir on a cross-country mission to save Christmas from the Shopocalypse (the end of humankind from consumerism, over-consumption and the fires of eternal debt.) The film also delves into issues such as the role sweatshops play in America?s mass consumerism and Big-Box Culture. From the humble beginnings of preaching at his portable pulpit on New York City subways, to having a congregation of thousands ? Bill Talen (aka Rev. Billy) has become the leader of not just a church, but a national movement.
